# Introduction

## About me

![Image of myself](imgs/profile.jpg)

An undergraduate at Singapore Institute of Technology pursuing a Bachelor of Science with Honors in Applied Artificial Intelligence. 

Work experience includes the involvement in project management, research, prototyping, and software programming. 

Projects:

- Integrating fundamental Artificial Intelligence, Internet of Things, and Microcontroller to existing rehabilitative technology for elderly undergoing physical and cognitive therapy 
- Research and prototyping using Near-Infrared (NIR) technology to aid in therapy

My area of expertise includes, but not limited to:

1. Python Programming
2. Object-Oriented Programming
3. Machine Learning
4. Data Structures and Algorithms
5. Research
